description: Returns summaries of invoked Hooks when a change set or Cloud Control API operation target is provided.

parameters.name: TargetType
parameters.description: The type of operation being targeted by the Hook.

parameters.name: TargetId
parameters.description: The logical ID of the target the operation is acting on by the Hook. If the target is a change set, it's the ARN of the change set. If the target is a Cloud Control API operation, this will be the HookRequestToken returned by the Cloud Control API operation request. For more information on the HookRequestToken, see ProgressEvent.

nested_items.name: TargetType
nested_items.description: The type of operation being targeted by the Hook.

nested_items.name: TargetId
nested_items.description: The logical ID of the target the operation is acting on by the Hook. If the target is a change set, it's the ARN of the change set.

nested_items.name: HookResults
nested_items.description: A list of HookResultSummary structures that provides the status and Hook status reason for each Hook invocation for the specified target.

nested_items.name: InvocationPoint
nested_items.description: The exact point in the provisioning logic where the Hook runs.

nested_items.name: FailureMode
nested_items.description: The failure mode of the invocation. The following are potential modes:
FAIL: If the hook invocation returns a failure, then the requested target operation should fail.
WARN: If the hook invocation returns a failure, then the requested target operation should warn.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The type name of the Hook being invoked.

nested_items.name: TypeVersionId
nested_items.description: The version of the Hook being invoked.

nested_items.name: TypeConfigurationVersionId
nested_items.description: The version of the Hook type configuration.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The state of the Hook invocation.

nested_items.name: HookStatusReason
nested_items.description: A description of the Hook results status. For example, if the Hook result is in a FAILED state, this may contain additional information for the FAILED state.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Pagination token, null or empty if no more results.
